      Geometry GeometryFactory.createBoundingBoxGeometry​(BoundingBox bbox, float r, float g, float b)  
      Geometry GeometryFactory.createHighResolutionCloudGeometry​(PointCloud cloud)
      Extracts the xyzrgb buffer data from the cloud and creates a geometry from it.
      Geometry GeometryFactory.createNormalColoredCloudGeometry​(PointCloud cloud)
      Extracts the xyzrgb buffer data from the cloud and creates a geometry from it; the rgb data is given by the values of the components of the normal vector within each point.
      Geometry GeometryFactory.createQHull​(PointCloud cloud)
      Creates a convex hull from the cloud and creates a geometry from it.
